origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceSupportAPI.get_policy_impact', 'description': 'This function provides an analysis of the impact of financial support policies on the sports industry based on the policy type, year of implementation, and coverage area.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial support policy, e.g., sports, education, health.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year the policy was implemented.'}, {'name': 'coverageArea', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical area the policy covers, e.g., national, regional.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impactAnalysis', 'description': 'A detailed report on how the policy has affected the specified industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceSupportAPI.get_policy_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'sports', 'year'是'2023', 'coverageArea'是'national'.
